dialog.text: the top half is sky and the bottom half is grass
Are there clouds or anything in the sky?
yes, pretty much all of the sky has clouds
Are there any special details other than that? Like flowers or trees perhaps?
there is a row of thick trees between the sky and the grass. there are bushes in the bottom left corner.
there is a river from the bottom left corner to the right side at about a 15 degree angle up
Done. Did you peek yet? How does it look
There should be a lot more clouds in the sky. The river also should be wider and the tree line should be thicker at the right edge.
I tried my best to fill the sky with more clouds, but it only seems to create wide faint clouds. I implemented everything else I think
The river should be a bit more straight and the left side of it should be in the corner.
I tried my best to straighten the river and the left side of it is now actually in the corner.
